definitions.body: libation, with covenant sacrif. in making covenant Is 30:1 (=

molten metal, or image: [[עֵגֶל]] [[מַסֵּכָה]] molten calf Ex 32:4, Ex 32:8, De 9:16, Ne 9:18, cf. Ps 106:19; [[אֱלֽהֵי מַסֵּכָה]] molten gods Ex 34:17, Le 19:4; ´[[חַלְמֵי מ]] Nu 33:52; [[פֶּסֶל וּמַסֵּכָה]] De 27:15, Ju Jdg 17:3, Jdg 17:4, Jdg 18:14, Na 1:14, 2Ch 34:3, 2Ch 34:4, elsewh. (variously) De 9:12, Ju Jdg 18:17, Jdg 18:18, 1Ki 14:9, 2Ki 17:16, 2Ch 28:2, Is 30:22, Is 42:17, Ho 13:2, Hb Hab 2:18.
